item.title: Max stat
item.dc:creator: @xdeathxmagex xdeathxmagex
item.description:
@xdeathxmagex wrote:

go to client.java and add this with your other commands:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxstats")) {
addSkillXP(1400000000, 0); 
addSkillXP(1400000000, 1); 
addSkillXP(1400000000, 2); 
addSkillXP(1400000000, 3); 
addSkillXP(1400000000, 4); 
addSkillXP(1400000000, 5); 
addSkillXP(1400000000, 6);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 7);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 8);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 9); 
addSkillXP(1400000000, 10); 
addSkillXP(1400000000, 11);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 12); 
addSkillXP(1400000000, 13); 
addSkillXP(1400000000, 14); 
addSkillXP(1400000000, 15); 
addSkillXP(1400000000, 16); 
addSkillXP(1400000000, 17); 
addSkillXP(1400000000, 18); 
addSkillXP(1400000000, 19); 
addSkillXP(1400000000, 20); 
addSkillXP(1400000000, 21); 
addSkillXP(1400000000, 22);
addSkillXP(1400000000, 23); 
addSkillXP(1400000000, 24);
sendMessage("You are now maxed.");
}

That’s the command for ingame to max your stats.

Now here is how you set what they start with.

Open player.java and search for:

			if (i == 3) {

It should look like this:

		for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++) { //Setting Levels
			if (i == 3) {
				playerLevel[i] = 10;
				playerXP[i] = 1155;
			} else {
				playerLevel[i] = 1;
				playerXP[i] = 0;
			}
		}

Ok, now right before the word else and right after {. This is where we will enter code.

			else if (i == ENTER NUMBER HERE) {
				playerLevel[i] = ENTER LEVEL HERE;
				playerXP[i] = ENTER AMOUNT OF XP FOR THAT LEVEL;
			}

Enter the number of the skill where it says “ENTER NUMBER HERE”…here is the list:

Attack = 0
Defence = 1
Strength = 2
Hitpoints = 3
Ranged = 4
Prayer = 5
Magic = 6
Cooking = 7
Woodcutting = 8
Fletching = 9
Fishing = 10
Firemaking = 11
Crafting = 12
Smithing = 13
Mining = 14
Herblore = 15
Agility = 16
Thieving = 17
Slayer = 18
Farming = 19
Runecrafting = 20

Here is an example for attack:

			else if (i == 0) {
				playerLevel[i] = 37;
				playerXP[i] = 27473;
			}

That would give the player an attack level of 37.

After you enter the code you want. Save and Compile and there you go!

Just ask me if you need an XP chart.

Read full topic
